title: SamaritanMan
author: SamaritanMan
content: Hi all,which are the coins/pools with the shortest payment time, with coins such as aion, conflux, sero, ergo and so on?I read about a pool that pays every 2 hours.Thanks!

comments.author: alucard20724
comments.body: Quote from: SamaritanMan on May 08, 2022, 05:22:34 AMHi all,which are the coins/pools with the shortest payment time, with coins such as aion, conflux, sero, ergo and so on?I read about a pool that pays every 2 hours.Thanks!there are minimum requirements... they pay every two hours when you meet their minimum requirements... if you're small time, it's going to be waaaay longer.If you have $100k worth of equipment, you might make it every two hours... might.. make. it...

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: Quote from: SamaritanMan on May 08, 2022, 05:22:34 AMHi all,which are the coins/pools with the shortest payment time, with coins such as aion, conflux, sero, ergo and so on?I read about a pool that pays every 2 hours.Thanks!Since you aren't mining Ethereum your payout will be faster, these coins have low value in dollars wise for example Ergo coin is just 3$ per coin, what's your hashrate anyway or how many gpu are you using? Drop the type of GPUs you currently own.

comments.author: SamaritanMan
comments.body: Here my gpus:2X GeForce GTX 10801X Radeon RX 6600 XT2X GeForce RTX 3060 Ti3X GeForce RTX 3070 Ti2X Radeon RX 6800 XT1X Radeon RX 6700 XTand i'm planning to add the 12th, but i'm confused about taking another 3070 Ti or 6800 XT or 6700 XT.Considering i want to mine coins other than ETH, such as Raven, Sero, Conflux, Aion, Erg and in these coin's algos, the LHR limit of my five nvidia gpus, should not be active, wich coins/pools do you recommand me to move on?My total hashrate is next to 600mh/s, because i use also my gaming laptop for mining on the same coin/pool and it has a 3060Ti mobile gpu, with an hashrate of about 37mh/s.So the total hashrate is 550mh/s for the rig and 37mh/s for my laptop.

comments.author: TreyARC
comments.body: Quote from: SamaritanMan on May 08, 2022, 09:06:39 AMHere my gpus:2X GeForce GTX 10801X Radeon RX 6600 XT2X GeForce RTX 3060 Ti3X GeForce RTX 3070 Ti2X Radeon RX 6800 XT1X Radeon RX 6700 XTand i'm planning to add the 12th, but i'm confused about taking another 3070 Ti or 6800 XT or 6700 XT.Considering i want to mine coins other than ETH, such as Raven, Sero, Conflux, Aion, Erg and in these coin's algos, the LHR limit of my five nvidia gpus, should not be active, wich coins/pools do you recommand me to move on?My total hashrate is next to 600mh/s, because i use also my gaming laptop for mining on the same coin/pool and it has a 3060Ti mobile gpu, with an hashrate of about 37mh/s.So the total hashrate is 550mh/s for the rig and 37mh/s for my laptop.You will get paid every four hours using Nicehash platform, 550MH can do 18$ per day so use viabtc or 2miners pool, you will get paid once every day no matter how much you have mined, even if it's just 2$ you will get paid, do your own research.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Set up payouts to the polygon network. There is a minimum withdrawal limit and you can request a manual withdrawal.https://ethermine.org/Since nicehash has released a new software for unlocking LHR video cards, it is most profitable for you to mine ethereum
